name: Alex Doe
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with over 8 years of experience in designing, developing, and deploying high-performance, scalable backend systems. Proficient in Rust, Go, and Python with a strong background in cloud-native technologies, distributed systems, and DevOps practices. Passionate about writing clean, efficient, and maintainable code.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer
responsibilities: Led the design and implementation of a new microservices-based architecture in Rust, improving system performance by 40% and reducing latency by 60ms.
Developed and maintained critical APIs for data processing pipelines, handling over 1 million requests per minute.
Mentored junior engineers, conducted code reviews, and established best practices for Rust development within the team.
Automated deployment processes using Kubernetes and CI/CD pipelines (GitHub Actions), reducing deployment time from hours to minutes.

experience.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Developed backend services using Go and Python for a large-scale data analytics platform.
Contributed to the core data ingestion service, improving its throughput by 25% through performance optimizations.
Collaborated with front-end teams to define and implement RESTful APIs.
Participated in an on-call rotation to ensure the reliability and uptime of production systems.

skills.list: Tokio, Axum, Actix-Web, Gin, Django, React
Docker, Kubernetes, AWS, GCP, Terraform, Git, GitHub Actions, Prometheus, Grafana

projects.name: Petty PDF Generator (Personal Project)
projects.description: A Rust-based document generation engine inspired by Apache FOP. It transforms structured JSON data into PDFs using a stylesheet that defines page layout, styling, and data-driven templates. Features both JSON-native and XSLT-based templating.
projects.technologies: Rust, Tokio, Serde, Handlebars, PrintPDF, Quick-XML
